column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////One of the best meals that I've had in a long time! The tapas were ridiculously good and everything on the menu was delicious. The potatoes were my favorite tapas that we chose
column2: but they all were outstanding! The food was hot
column4: and delicious! It's the perfect place for casual dining
column6: or even a casual date! The servers and staff are SO friendly and definitely knowledgable and helpful when it comes to giving recommendations. I will definitely be coming back!
